name: Shenzhen
title: Shenzhen - Traveling China like your home yard
overview: Shenzhen is a modern metropolis in Guangdong Province, transformed from a small fishing village to China's first Special Economic Zone. Known as China's Silicon Valley, Shenzhen is famous for its technology industry, modern architecture, theme parks, and proximity to Hong Kong, offering a glimpse into China's rapid modernization.

highlights.attractions: Window of the World, Splendid China, OCT Loft, Dameisha Beach, Ping An Finance Center
highlights.cuisine: Cantonese Dim Sum, Seafood, International Cuisine, Street Food
highlights.bestTime: Year-round destination, best in Spring and Autumn with mild weather
